Numerology.title: YOUR NAME IN NUMEROLOGY
Numerology.subtitle: Discover how the letters of your name influence your destiny

long_cycles.title: Long Cycles: Personal Year & Month
long_cycles.desc: Your Personal Year changes every January 1st (or on your birthday depending on configuration) and lasts 12 months. It represents the general trend of the year. The Personal Month gives you the 'flavor' of each month.

powerful_advice.title: Powerful Advice
powerful_advice.desc: At the start of your Personal Year: read the full annual forecast, mark strong months on your calendar (e.g., month 8 for finances, month 6 for relationships, month 9 for closures). Plan important actions aligning them with those months.

practical_tips.title: Practical Tips
practical_tips.colors: Favorable Colors: wear them in clothes/accessories.
practical_tips.numbers: Lucky Numbers: choose dates with them.
practical_tips.crystals: Stones/Crystals: carry them to important appointments.
practical_tips.hours: Power Hours/Days: set aligned affirmations (e.g., if you are a 7 ‚Üí 'I trust my intuition').

tooltips.destiny: Destiny: Sum of all letters in the full name.
tooltips.life_path: Life Path: Calculated by summing all digits of your date (DD+MM+YYYY) reducing to 1-9 or Master (11, 22, 33).

hero.tagline: Proven system with real results in northwest Chicago suburbs and southern Wisconsin.

directory.text:
Our

Pinterest

Directory has +80 pins organized by service categories that help customers find businesses like yours when they're ready to buy or hire. You can explore the sections, save your favorites, and contact them directly.

benefits.title: Why Pinterest works for local and USA businesses
benefits.description: Pinterest is a visual search engine: people come here to plan, compare, and choose services. Unlike social posts that disappear quickly, Pinterest pins can keep appearing in searches for weeks or even months. That means consistent visibility and traffic from people actively looking for what you offer.
usp: Search-driven traffic helps you get discovered
Pins keep working long after posting
Ideal for services, restaurants, shops, and professionals

traffic.title: Constant Traffic over Time
traffic.desc: Pinterest works like a search: when people look for services and ideas, your pin can keep appearing over time. Unlike posts that disappear quickly, pins can keep generating website visits and inquiries long after being published.

intent.title: High Intent Customers
intent.desc: Pinterest users are planners. They save options, compare providers, and return when they're ready to book or buy. This means clicks usually come from people with real intent, not just casual scrolling.

seo.title: Pinterest SEO Optimization
seo.desc: We optimize titles, keywords, and categories so you get found. We use service + location terms (e.g., 'Cleaning service in Chicago suburbs') so Pinterest understands what you offer.

community.title: Featured in the Latino Community
community.desc: This is more than a random post: it's your place within a curated directory for Latino businesses. This adds credibility, helps category discovery, and builds trust with new customers.

creative.title: Professional Pins that Convert
creative.desc: We create pins that look professional and trustworthy: clear titles, impactful visuals, and a direct call to action. This improves click-through rates and makes your business the obvious choice.

performance.title: Measurable Performance
performance.desc: Pinterest provides clear metrics (impressions, saves, outbound clicks). We use those signals to understand what content works best and how to keep improving visibility and results.

benefits.contrast: Unlike Facebook or Instagram, pins don't disappear in 24 hours: they continue to generate visibility, clicks, and customers over time.

industries.title: Solutions for Every Industry
industries.subtitle: We adapt our strategy to the specific needs of your business.
industries.footer: These examples show how different industries can use Pinterest to attract customers who are actively searching and planning.

items.desc: Protect and maintain your customers' asphalt.

items.desc: Technical customization for companies and events.

items.desc: Reach every mailbox with direct mail.

items.title: Tax Services
items.desc: Tax preparation and professional fiscal advisory.

industries.reinforcement: Don't see your industry here? We also work with other local services, professionals, and growing businesses across the United States.
industries.guidance: These are some industries that see results. If your business isn't on the list, we can also adapt it to your category.

how_it_works.footer: We design, optimize, and publish. You just respond to messages and convert.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We resolve your doubts so you can make the best decision.

items.q: Do I need a Pinterest account?
items.a: No. You don't need to manage Pinterest yourself. We create, optimize, and post pins for your business. If you already have an account, we can connect and optimize it.

items.q: Is this a one-time or monthly payment?
items.a: This is a one-time payment per package. There are no mandatory monthly fees. Your pins remain active and visible in searches after posting.

items.q: What happens if I don't have a website?
items.a: No problem. We can link your pin to WhatsApp, a booking page, Instagram, or your Google Business Profile.

items.q: How long does it take to see results?
items.a: Pinterest works differently than social media. Some activity may start within days, but the strongest results generally build over time as pins continue to appear in searches.

items.q: What type of businesses work best on Pinterest?
items.a: Service businesses, restaurants, local professionals, retail, and visual services work especially well. We adapt the strategy to your industry.

items.q: Can I update my pin later?
items.a: Yes. Small updates like links or text adjustments are included. Larger redesigns or additional pins may require a package upgrade.

items.q: Do you guarantee sales or leads?
items.a: We guarantee professional setup, SEO optimization, and correct placement. Results vary by industry, location, season, and competition, so specific sales results are not guaranteed.
Both. Pinterest is a national platform. We optimize your pins for local, state, or nationwide exposure, depending on your business goals.
Yes, Pinterest is a global platform. We focus your strategy on the United States (or local based on your service) to maximize results in your target market.

items.q: Can I appear in multiple cities/states?
items.a: Yes, with the Elite package or a multi-city strategy we can optimize your presence for multiple locations across the United States.

faq.mini_cta: Want us to recommend the ideal plan for you? ‚Üí Chat on WhatsApp
